dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, Netflix is about to hit a $235 billion market cap. That is just… insane.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, Netflix is about to hit a two hundred thirty five dollars billion market cap. That is just... insane.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: $235 Billion That's Netflix's market capitalization the day before it's set to release third-quarter earnings.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Up nearly a hundred billion just this year. They're bigger than Disney now!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Up nearly a hundred billion just this year. They're bigger than Disney now!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It's up nearly $100 billion in 2020 alone, making the 23-year-old streaming giant one of the 20 largest companies on the S&P 500 by market capahead of even media mainstays like Walt Disney, Comcast and AT&T.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and their stock is up like 60% since January. The S&P's only up 6.5%—Netflix is just crushing it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and their stock is up like sixty percent since January. The S&P's only up six point five percent-Netflix is just crushing it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Netflix shares have soared more than 60% since the beginning of the year. To compare, the S&P 500 is up just 6.5% in 2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Reed Hastings, the CEO? He's made almost two billion dollars during the pandemic alone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Reed Hastings, the C E O? He's made almost two billion dollars during the pandemic alone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The firm's billionaire cofounder and CEO, Reed Hastings, has gotten nearly $2 billion during the pandemic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. From mailing DVDs to a five billion net worth. That's quite the pivot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. From mailing DVDs to a five billion net worth. That's quite the pivot.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 60-year-old, who launched Netflix as a DVD subscription service in 1997 and owns roughly 1% of its shares, is now worth about $5.4 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And they're expected to report 195 million subscribers this quarter.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And they're expected to report one hundred ninety five million subscribers this quarter.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 195 Million That's the number of paid subscribers analysts expect Netflix will report on Tuesday, up 2.5 million quarter to quarter and in line with the firm's latest guidance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which, honestly, might even be low—CFRA thinks that estimate could be conservative.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, honestly, might even be low-C F R A thinks that estimate could be conservative.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That increase could even prove conservative, noted investment research firm CFRA on Monday, reiterating its buy rating on Netflix shares and adding that the firm could be bolstered by an increase in subscribers from international markets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Especially with all those international subscribers jumping on. People stuck at home need their binge-watching fix.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Especially with all those international subscribers jumping on. People stuck at home need their binge-watching fix.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That increase could even prove conservative, noted investment research firm CFRA on Monday, reiterating its buy rating on Netflix shares and adding that the firm could be bolstered by an increase in subscribers from international markets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're pulling in, what, $6.5 billion in revenue this quarter? Up over 20% from last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're pulling in, what, six point five dollars billion in revenue this quarter? Up over twenty percent from last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Analysts are expecting Netflix will pull nearly $6.4 billion in third-quarter revenues, up more than 20% from the same period last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Though earnings per share are down a bit because of pandemic costs, but still—massive growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Though earnings per share are down a bit because of pandemic costs, but still-massive growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company's also expected to report earnings of about $2.13 per share, down from $1.47 per share last year on heightened costs amid the pandemic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And get this—Bank of America just set a price target of $670 for Netflix.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this-Bank of America just set a price target of six hundred seventy dollars for Netflix.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: $670 That's the price target Bank of America issued on Friday for Netflix, up nearly 17% from a prior target of $575 and representing the highest Netflix price target on Wall Street.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Six seventy?! That's the highest on Wall Street. They really believe in that long-term subscriber boost.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Six seventy?! That's the highest on Wall Street. They really believe in that long-term subscriber boost.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: $670 That's the price target Bank of America issued on Friday for Netflix, up nearly 17% from a prior target of $575 and representing the highest Netflix price target on Wall Street.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Even with some uncertainty and that controversial movie release, they're super bullish.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Even with some uncertainty and that controversial movie release, they're super bullish.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Despite near-term uncertainties around second-half subscriber growthand a highly criticized movie release, Bank of America said it continues to see the acceleration in Netflix subscriber growth during the first half of the year as a permanent benefit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So, despite a little September dip, Netflix is basically pandemic-proof entertainment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, despite a little September dip, Netflix is basically pandemic-proof entertainment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Though they took a small hit amid the broader market's September correctionafter an all-time Netflix high in late Augustshares of the Los Gatos, California-based firm are once again nearing peak levels.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It feels like they're just getting started.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It feels like they're just getting started.
